author: Donald Judd and Maegan Vazquez
title: Biden requests Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker resign from presidential council or be terminated

sentence: The White House requested for Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition on Wednesday, or else face termination, according to CNN.
author: Alex Nitzberg
title: White House ousts Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker from President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: Just as President Joe Biden has reportedly asked GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker and Mehmet Oz to resign their posts on the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Biden has announced his intent to appoint their replacements.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Biden moves to oust GOP Senate candidates Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz for Jos Andrs, Elena Delle Donne

sentence: The White House has removed Dr. Mehmet Oz best known as daytime TVs host of The Dr. Oz Show and former football star Herschel Walker from the Presidents Council on Sports, Nutrition and Fitness as both men run for U.S. Senate.
title: Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz removed from Biden's sports council

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker were both appointed to the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition by twice-popular-voter-loser former President Donald Trump.
title: Biden requests resignations of Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker by end of day

sentence: President Biden formally asked two Trump-appointed members of the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz to resign or else be fired, citing administration policy that bars candidates for federal office to serve on presidential boards.
author: Tom Howell Jr.
title: Biden tells Herschel Walker, Dr. Oz to resign from presidential fitness board

sentence: President Joe Biden informed Republican Senate candidates Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker that they needed to resign from the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition or they would be removed.
author: Misty Severi
title: Biden forces out Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from fitness council

sentence: A similar notification was issued to Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker, who is running for the Senate in Georgia.
title: Biden demands Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker step down amid Senate runs

sentence: Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker speaks at a rally featuring former President Donald Trump in Perry, Ga., on Sept. 25.Sean Rayford / Getty Images file Earlier Wednesday, the White House announced plans to name the chef Jos Andrs and the WNBA player Elena Delle Donne as co-chairs of the presidential council, of which Walker has been the chair and Oz has been a member.
title: White House moves to oust Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from presidential advisory panel

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: RESIGNATIONS SOUGHT - President Biden requested two members of the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition, Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz, who were appointed by former President Trump, either step down or face termination amid their U.S. Senate runs in Georgia and Pennsylvania.
title: Biden demands Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker resign; The spies among us -- one former spy speaks out

sentence: Oz, best known as the host of The Dr. Oz Show, and Herschel Walker were both sent letters on Wednesday asking them to resign by the end of the day or they would be terminated, a White House official told NBC News.
author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Dr. Oz Calls Biden 'Petty' After Being Asked to Quit President's Council

sentence: A White House official told CNN Wednesday that Oz, along with fellow council member and Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, were in violation of the Biden administration's policy of federal candidates serving on presidential boards.
author: Heather Hamilton
title: WATCH: Dr. Oz responds to Bidens request that he resign from fitness council

sentence: The White House sent letters to Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker, telling them they would be fired if they did not resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition, a White House official said.
author: Rick Rouan
title: Biden asks GOP Senate candidates Mehmet Oz, Herschel Walker to resign from presidential board

sentence: President Joe Biden has axed Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from advisory roles with the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition due to their current candidacies for the U.S. Senate.
author: Charles Passy
title: Why President Biden fired Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from a federal fitness council

sentence: But Mehmet Oz, MD, still brought up Fauci in response to the Biden Administration asking both him and Herschel Walker to resign from the Council.
author: Bruce Y. Lee
title: Dr. Mehmet Oz Asked To Resign From Presidents Council, Brings Up Dr. Fauci Again

sentence: Oz's termination from the Presidential Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition came a week after President Joe Biden asked him and fellow GOP Senate candidate Herschel Walker to resign from the council.
author: Chelsey Cox
title: Senate candidate and TV host Dr. Oz removed from presidential fitness council

sentence: Last month, President Joe Biden asked Oz and Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker to leave the Presidential Council on Sports, Fitness, and Nutrition.
author: Katie Wadington
title: Trump endorses celebrity surgeon Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania's Senate race

sentence: Donald Trump has "racked up quite a roster of endorsees: Dr. Oz, Herschel Walker, Sarah Palin his goal is to turn Congress into The Celebrity Apprentice," Kimmel said.

title: Late night hosts explore Russia's sanctions pains, Don Jr.'s election texts, Trump's Dr. Oz nod

sentence: White House removes Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker from advisory panel after Senate runs March 24, 202200:17 But by the time McCormick showed up Wednesday, Trump was already close to endorsing Oz, said two other Trump advisers, who said Trump wasnt swayed by the arguments of those close to him who were backing McCormick.
title: Dr. Oz bets Trump endorsement can catapult him in Pa. Senate race

sentence: Or perhaps McConnell might have been referring to Herschel Walker, the Republican running for Georgias Senate seat whom McConnell himself has endorsed.
title: Opinion: After appealing to con men, the GOP now complains about the hucksters

sentence: During a segment discussing the Senate candidacies of celebrity TV doctor Mehmet Oz and former star football player Herschel Walker, Hostin decried the idea that Americans would vote to elect celebrities with no political experience, pointing to Trump as reason not to vote for them.

title: 'The View's' Sunny Hostin claims Trump 'ran the country into the ground' despite multiple crises under Biden

sentence: Hostin also compares Oz's situation to that of former football running back Herschel Walker, who came out as the front-runner in recent polls amid his campaign to acquire a Senate seat in Georgia.

title: "The View" hosts tickled by "Trump minions" at Fox News who are split over Dr. Oz Senate endorsement

sentence: Other out-of-state candidates like David McCormick, Ozs chief Republican rival in Pennsylvania, as well as Herschel Walker in Georgia have faced similar scrutiny this year.
title: Sections

sentence: This follows his endorsement of Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvanias Senate Republican primary and Herschel Walker in the Georgia Senate race.

sentence: Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania's Senate Republican primary and Herschel Walker in the Georgia Senate race.

title: We're Running Out of Time to Hold Trump Accountable | Opinion

sentence: Polling averages have Georgia Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock trailing Trump-endorsed Herschel Walker in Georgia, with Hassan, Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona, and Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto of Nevada all in competitive races.

title: Biden thinks Democrats can gain Senate seats this year  with Trump's help

sentence: As their statewide campaigns move forward, Georgias Herschel Walker and Pennsylvanias Mehmet Oz have quite a bit in common.

sentence: Walker's college-aged son, Christian, is a popular conservative political commentator on social media platforms like Twitter and Twitter, where he often posts videos blasting liberal political views popular among Gen Z.
